oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Farmāns made by Aga Khan III between February and December 1905 in Zanzibar, Nairobi, Mombasa, Poona and Gwader.
Title and publication data missing, pp. 1-1.16 and all after 2.20 missing.
Pages in fair condition, some brittle and severely damaged; fairly strong binding; covers missing.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
